name: Shadowed Home
description:
This game was developed from April 2021 to January 2022 by a team of five people: a level designer, programmer/animator, image/texture artist, voice actor, and sound/music producer. We developed the game as a debut project to show off our skills and what we can do in future projects and it was a lot of fun every step of the way!

If you enjoyed the game, consider joining our Discord server where we show off the development of our games live!

https://discord.gg/3GyhR3nRFA

Rating the game helps, too!

(We're unsure if the MacOS and Linux builds will work as they were a last minute build. Feel free to download, test, and let us know what version of MacOS or distro of Linux you're using and we'll create a devlog with a list of the compatible versions and distros!)
